title: 'We need big changes': McLaren boss says virus is final wake-up call for unhealthy F1
description: A leading voice in Formula One warns there is a serious threat of losing teams if big changes are not made to the competition.
content:
Posted 
April 16, 2020 08:15:14
The COVID-19 crisis is a final wake-up call for an already "unhealthy" Formula One which risks losing teams unless drastic changes are made, McLaren team principal Andreas Seidl has warned.
Key points:
